name: Aceternity UI
description: A border glowing effect that adapts to any container or card, as seen on Cursor's website.

props.Description: The amount of blur applied to the glowing effect in pixels
The radius multiplier for the center zone where the effect is disabled. Value between 0 and 1
The distance in pixels beyond the element's bounds where the effect remains active
The angular spread of the glowing effect in degrees
The color variant of the effect. "default" uses a multi-color gradient, while "white" uses a black and white scheme
When true, forces the effect to be visible regardless of hover state
Additional CSS classes to apply to the effect container
When true, disables the interactive glowing effect
The duration of the glow movement animation in seconds
The width of the glowing border in pixels

usage_notes: A border glowing effect that adapts to any container or card, as seen on Cursor's website.
imports: import { Box, Lock, Search, Settings, Sparkles } from "lucide-react";
